title: Microlearning Workshop for Strengthening Staff-Student Collaboration in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment construction utilizing mobile devices and real-time collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Participants will be able to develop a plan to apply at least two collaborative tools after a 20-minute session.
By the end of the learning, participants will be able to explain how to utilize at least one digital platform for linking research and education.
Within 72 hours after completing the educational course, participants will share and implement learned strategies with one peer.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
